item.title: Easy Chicken and Rice Casserole
item.description: ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 5 min üç≥ Cook time: 40 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 4 Ingredients 1/2 cup Onion, chopped 1/2 cup Celery, chopped 2 Tbsp Butter or margarine 2 cups Chicken, cooked and chopped 1 3/4 cups Hot water 2/3 cup Long Grain White Rice 1 can (10 oz) Mushrooms with liquid 1 cup Frozen Peas and Carrots 1 tsp Dried Thyme and Rosemary Directions In large fry pan, cook onion and celery in butter until soft.

item.title: Ham and Lentil Soup
item.description: For more flavour, boil down a soup bone and use the broth when filling the crock pot. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 5 min üç≥ Cook time: 8 hour üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 6 Ingredients 2 cup Lentils 1/2 lb Ham, diced 1 Onion, chopped 1 Bay leaf 2 ribs Celery, chopped 1 clove Garlic, minced Directions Combine all ingredients with 2 quarts water in the Crock Pot. Cook on low, covered, 8 to 10 hours.
